regex.name: getPageNumbers
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): frompage,topage=re.findall( "date/1\">([0-9]+)[\w\W\s]{0,614}date/([0-9]+)",page_data)[0] frompage=int(frompage) topage=int(topage) print range(frompage,topage) return range(frompage,topage)
